rpc.schema
Class Metadata

java.lang.Object
  rpc.schema.Metadata

public class Metadata
extends java.lang.Object

The Metadata class offers a collection of methods that provide additional information on statistics about the database.

Constructor Summary
Metadata()
           
 
Method Summary
static int getDistinctValues(Path p, Aggregator agg)
          Get the number of distinct values for a particular path and an aggregator.
static int getItemCount(SchemaItem si)
          Get the number of rows in the database for a particular schema item.
static void reset()
          Empties the caches that map the number of each schema item in the database and the cache that maps the number of distinct values for each path and aggregator.

clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

Empties the caches that map the number of each schema item in the database and the cache that maps the number of distinct values for each path and aggregator.

getItemCount

public static int getItemCount(SchemaItem si)
Get the number of rows in the database for a particular schema item.

Parameters:

Returns:

getDistinctValues

public static int getDistinctValues(Path p,
                                    Aggregator agg)
Get the number of distinct values for a particular path and an aggregator.

Parameters:
p - the path to a particular variable.
agg - the aggregator over the path.
Returns:
the number of distinct values.
